problem: There was a problem activating your special offer.
stayFree: Stay with Gaia for another month for free.
offerPeriod: Your free Subscription period is from ${ paidThroughDate } to ${ offerEndDate }. You will be automatically billed and re-enrolled under your current plan at the end of the free 30 days.
subscriptionExtended: Your subscription has been extended until ${ offerEndDate }, when it will be automatically renewed.
notEligible: You are not eligible for the free month offer. If you would like to reactivate your membership, you can do so from the ${ myAccount } page or contact our ${ customerRelations } team for assistance.
